pacman.controller

类 GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.controller.GameController
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.util.Observer

    public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Class GameController manipulates game objects and update changes to the view.

    This class manipulates with keyboard input and update the view accordingly. This class is the observer of GameManager class. When GameManager notify this class, corresponding changes to the view will be executed.

    作者:
    Zhangli Wang

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      GameController(javafx.scene.Group root)

    • 构造器详细资料

      • GameController

        public GameController(javafx.scene.Group root)

    • 方法详细资料

      • drawBoard

        public void drawBoard()
        Draw the board of the game with the maze and game items to the view.

        Items are: obstacles, ghostObstacles, cookieSet, pacman, leftPortal, rightPortal, scoreBoard of the gameModel.

      • endGameDisplay

        public void endGameDisplay()
        End game display.

        All actors are cleared from the view. Instead of the score board, a game over prompt is displayed at the bottom area.

      • restartGameDisplay

        public void restartGameDisplay(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        Restart game display.

        All children of the view are cleared. Properties in the game model are reset. The game board is drawn again.

        参数:
        event - ESCAPE is pressed

      • movePacman

        public void movePacman(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        Moves the pacman.

        According to keyboard input, animation of the pacman is run. The pacman can move up, left, down and right.

        参数:
        event - direction keys are pressed

      • stopPacman

        public void stopPacman(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        Stops the pacman.

        According to keyboard event, animation of the pacman is stopped.

        参数:
        event - direction keys are released

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        Update the view.

        According to parameters passed by the observed game model, the view is updated.

        If "1" is passed, the pacman's life is lost. Animation of the pacman will be stopped and the score board will be updated.

        If "2" is passed, the game is ended. endGameDisplay is called, scores are recorded and high score window is displayed.

        If "3" is passed, in infinite mode, current level is cleared. The next level entry is added to the root children and displayed.

        If "4" is passed, in infinite mode, the pacman has entered the next level. Game display is refreshed.

        指定者:
        update 在接口中 java.util.Observer
        参数:
        o - the observed object
        arg - the passed parameter for the observer
